name: Iradea Academy DEMO
description:
"You've just moved to new city, but life doesn't always go as planned. Where will this newfound experience lead? Will you make friends, become a loner, or even fall in love?"

Demo is an introductory into most of the characters, and does have errors that we're aware of. Other comments, concerns, and discussions are welcomed.

Project size is currently at 43000 words.
4 Routes, plus 2 secret routes
